description: The notification will be sent when AP changes the work mode, and
hpnicfDot11APWorkMode suggests which work mode will be used by AP.

event.Summary: Access point (MAC: $v3) work mode: $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtWorkModeChgTrap HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APID s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APChgWorkMode i 1 HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtTrapAPMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: To uniquely identify each AP, and relation-ship between hpnicfDot11APID
and AP device will be static.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APID

description: Represents what work mode for AP.
The following values are supported:
normal - AP will supply WLAN service.
monitor - AP will be a monitor to detect attack.
hybrid - AP will supply WLAN service and detect attack.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APChgWorkMode

description: Represents the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtTrapAPMacAddress

description: The notification will represent errors caused by the
configuration operation of AP.

event.Summary: Access point configuration operation error detected because of $v3

description: The notification will notify which the operational status

description: To uniquely identify each AP, and relation-ship between hpnicfDot11APID
and AP device will be static.

description: Represents each radio.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11RadioID

description: Represents errors caused by configuration operation.
The following values are supported:
config - Configuration error
hpnicferror - Hardware error
swerror - Software error
radar - Radar Detection
unknown - Unknown reason

description: To uniquely identify each AP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtAPID

description: Represents the type which uplink switches to.
The following values are supported:
TDSCDMA - The uplink switches to TDSCDMA.
TDLTE - The uplink switches to TDLTE.
unknown - Unknown uplink type.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtUpLinkSwitchInfo

description: Represents the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtTrapAPMacAddress

description: Represents the time when uplink switches.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtUpLinkSwitchTime

description: Represents the cell id before uplink switch.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtOldCellId

description: Represents the cell id after uplink switch.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtCurCellId

description: Represents the band before uplink switch.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-APMT-MIB::hpnicfDot11APMtOldBand

description: Represents the band after uplink switch.
